p.add: INDEX BUREAU REC'D DEC 8 '00 DEP'T OF STATE

div1.p: No. 53. "Consular" Legation of the United States, Monrovia Liberia; Nov. 8, 1900.
Hon. Thos. W. Cridler. Third Assistant Secretary of State, Washington.

p.add: BUREAU OF APPOINTMENTS, DEC 14 1900 Department of State
Noted- Ach'd by form & Auditor inf'd Dec 13 1900

div1.p: Subject. The date of the closing of the United States Consular Agency at Cape Coast Castle, British Gold Coast Colony.
No. 53. "Consular" Legation of the United States, Monrovia Liberia; Nov. 8, 1900
Hon. Thos. W. Cridler, Third Assistant Secretary of State, Washington.
Sir: I have to acknowledge the receipt Nov. 7, 1900 of your No. 28, Oct. 8, 1900, asking for a more deffinite date of the closing of the Cape Coast Castle, Consular Agency.
In reply, I have the honor to say, that said Agency, was closed June 26, 1900, while I was in Amenia. I have this day notified the Colonial Secretary Accra, of said event.
I have the honor to be yrs & c. Owen L. W. Smith, M. R. and C. G.
